name: Endra VR
description:
This might be my first ever VR game for those who love VR gaming, I will also offer a non-VR version for those who have no Headset or means to use VR.

In this game you will be playing as Karl and he has his beloved bat Screechy

at his side,  in a nutshell the game involves elemental stones you have to find and you'll have to defeat a neckbeard wizard who wants to use those stones to make anime girls real. (It seems like a good idea but really it's not.)

*Please bear in mind that this VR game is experimental since SGB has implemented VR but never really took it any farther than that, and that's fine.   Someone will have to play and someone will have to be the person who views the game with the headset, or whatever works for you.*
